com.jcodeing.kmedia.widget.android

Class BakedBezierInterpolator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcodeing.kmedia.widget.android.BakedBezierInterpolator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.animation.TimeInterpolator, android.view.animation.Interpolator

    final class BakedBezierInterpolator
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.animation.Interpolator
    A pre-baked bezier-curved interpolator for indeterminate progress animations.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        private static final BakedBezierInterpolator INSTANCE

      • VALUES

        private static final float[] VALUES
        Lookup table values. Generated using a Bezier curve from (0,0) to (1,1) with control points: P0 (0,0) P1 (0.4, 0) P2 (0.2, 1.0) P3 (1.0, 1.0) Values sampled with x at regular intervals between 0 and 1.

      • STEP_SIZE

        private static final float STEP_SIZE
